data.author: Mobile to Go

changelog.release_notes:
* added russian language
* intelligent activity mgmt. according the remaining battery charging level
* small refactoring
* some optimizations

data.description:
Have a glance at the street. Be surprised what happens during a day near to a tram station. An intelligent algorithm controls the activity to take the charging level of the battery into account. In addition it's a smart watchface with a lot of information gathered from internet. Rather additive the time, day and date (in nearly any language), the bluetooth connection as well as the battery state is shown. A tap of your wrist will in any case start a truck. It brings a billboard showing InfoPanels into the screen. The InfoPanels are switched in 60 sec delay or by accelerator control. Also a billboard at the trum bridge shows randomly selected short infos. Shown are the weather, the forecast of your current/ a selected fixed location, stock/currency values and up to 3 news feeds/ google alerts. But you can disable/ enable infos in the settings. 

Have fun! ;)

latest_release.release_notes:
* added russian language
* intelligent activity mgmt. according the remaining battery charging level
* small refactoring
* some optimizations

data.title: TramStation
